data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that being famous is a good thing or a bad thing? Provide several reasons to support your opinion.
data.answer: Being famous is a bad thing. If you are truly consisted on what your pursuits are, you would not care if you are famous or not. Instead, being famous might become a barrier for you because being famous would always disturb your initial goal and disperse your concentration. In addition, if you are famous, then all the impressions from other people who are not that close to you would be extremely biased and narrow. They percept what you show, and if they are happy about it, then everything is fine. If they are not happy about it or they realize you as a real person is different from what you show to strangers, they would judge and criticize you. This would bring you into a bad mood.
